name: 2025 7th International Conference on Intelligent Medicine and Image Processing
content: Publication: 1\. IMIP 2025 International Conference Proceedings, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). 2\. Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), which will be included in Scopus (Since 2021), Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, IndexCopernicus, etc.
